question: Which bank observing June 5-9, 2017 as Financial Literacy Week?
option4: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
explanation: The Reserve Bank of India is observing June 5-9, 2017 as Financial Literacy Week across the country to emphasize the importance of financial literacy. It will focus on four broad themes namely Know Your Customer (KYC), Exercising Credit Discipline, Grievance Redress and Going Digital.
